title: Spiffo Plush
summaries: The Spiffo Plush is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Spiffo pet to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, Spiffo will twirl its tail like a propeller to fly towards them. The Spiffo Plush has a 1/1500 (0.07%) chance of being dropped by Zombies, Frozen Zombies, and Raincoat Zombies.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
